column6: HARD LESSONS PART 2 Ultimate Wolverine makes his explosive return! Storm travels to the Great White North to find her missing friend, and the duo soon encounter a terrifying new threat--a classic Marvel villain making an Ultimate debut!
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
